mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Conner, Hugh
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Castle Bar Meo Co., Ireland [Castlebar, County Mayo, Ireland]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Conner, Hugh Patient Age: 40. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of the base of left ear anteriorly. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
